title: Madonna sticks out her tongue leaving Madame X tour gig in Chicago
text:
She's in the midst of her whirlwind Madame X concert tour in support of her latest album.

And despite being two months into the gruelling schedule, Madonna proved she was still keeping her spirits up as she made a cheeky exit from her gig on Sunday.

The veteran performer, 61, looked in high spirits as she poked her tongue out at photographers whilst leaving the Chicago Theater in Illinois.

Loving life: Despite being two months into her Madame X concert tour, Madonna proved she was still keeping her spirits up as she made a cheeky exit from her gig in Chicago on Sunday

Madonna kept warm by wrapping up in a typically outlandish coat that concealed her lithe figure.

The cosy black robe was adorned with bold gold Versace lettering and fell to mid calf length, exposing a pair of fishnet tights and chunky black boots.

Madonna's all-theatre tour started on September 17 in New York City, and is set to conclude next year on March 8 in Paris.

That's a wrap: Madonna kept warm by wrapping up in a typically outlandish coat that concealed her lithe figure. The cosy black robe was adorned with bold gold Versace lettering

Although Madonna is the queen of costumes, she isn't a fan of dressing up for Halloween.

Despite taking a backseat for the spooky holiday, the mother-of-six proved to be inspiration for Kylie Jenner, who emulated the singer last weekend.

Kylie looked every inch like Madonna from the MTV Video Music Awards in 2003 as she stepped out with her counterpart Stassie Karanikolaou who was dressed to thrill in a Britney Spears costume.

The 22-year-old billionaire got so into the costume that she leaned into her gal pal and reenacted the popstar's famous kiss.

The ladies danced and lip-synched to Madonna's Like A Virgin before Kylie threw her arm around her pal and went in for the smooch.

Madonna made pop culture history in 2003 when she locked lips with Britney on the stage, before sharing another smooch with Christina Aguilera seconds later.
description: Despite being two months into the gruelling schedule, Madonna proved she was still keeping her spirits up as she made a cheeky exit from her gig on Sunday.
